-- This file is generated from AbstractMachine.ump --


MODULE S2  
    
  VAR 
    state : { s2a , s2b , s1 }; 
    event : { e1 , e3 };      
  ASSIGN
    init(state) := s2a;    
  TRANS
    ( (state = s2a) -> (
      (event = e1 & next(state) = s1)  |
      (event = e3 & next(state) = s2b)  ) ) &
    ( (state = s2b) -> (
       event = e3 & next(state) = s2a) ) &
    ( (state = s1) -> (next(state) = state) )
